nodes.text: Enok Galir was a male scientist who worked for the Czerka Corporation at their CZ-198 research facility. At Special Executive Rasmus Blys's instruction, Galir and his fellows weaponized various creatures, such as Flesh Raiders from the planet Tython. Galir was horrified by their creations and consumed with guilt, and so he sent a message to his wife and his daughter Alara begging their forgiveness, as he believed he would not survive to see them again.
